name: Haunt Them
description:
Haunt Them is a 3rd person adventure game. Due to an unfortunate incident, Professor Pennyweight has died and subsequently turned into a ghost. He is tasked to solve various puzzle scenarios with his newfound ghostly powers. It soon becomes evident that being a ghost isn’t easy and the past seems to be – haunting.

Team
Niklas Alenius - 3D artist
Pietu Arvola - Sound & narrative designer
Prabhav Bhatnagar - Programmer & game designer
Tatu Heinämäki - Narrative & game designer
Matias Koskimies - Sound designer
Antti Mäkipää - Programmer & project manager
Nils Qvis - UI designer & QA
Toom Tragel - Game artist & QA

Produced as a part of Aalto University's Game Design studies.
